biblStruct.note: This article presents the first critical edition and Spanish translation of the text of an abridged version of the Acts of Thomas (BHG 1831d). For the edition four codices dated from the eleventh to the sixteenth century that preserve the text have been used. This version contains interesting innovations with respect to the primitive Acts of Thomas. Thus, the main focus has been placed on these elements and the role of this version within the general transmission of its source text.
